thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic
thread.title_full: Fantastic - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kate186220
title: Fantastic
text:
Stayed at the Arbor City hotel Aldgate East last weekend and was very impressed. We were upgraded to a superior room on the 5th Floor and it was lovely. Had great views over the city and a great bathroom. Very modern and spacious and clean.
Excellent check in staff lovely and fantastic location being 2 mins from Aldgate tube.
Hotel is at start of Brick lane so obvious choice for evening was a curry and it was really good. Best hotel I have stayed in London - usually have to stay on outskirts to afford anything as nice as this.
Breakfast very good choice and relaxing.
Room Tip: 5th floor great views See more room tips
